headline: Majority Leader Says a Briefing for the Senate Is Scheduled for Next Week
abstract: Lawmakers, sharply divided along party lines over President Trump’s decision to kill Iran’s top security commander, are pressing for details on the strike and the strategy for its aftermath.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The top Senate Republican said on Friday that the administration would brief all senators next week on the United States drone strike ordered by President Trump that killed Iran’s top security commander.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
